name: Crowd Playground
description:
The one and only crowd simulation game, Crowd Playground!

'Crowd Playground', a crowd world building simulation game, is coming in 2022!
Chop, burn, and electrocute the crowds of zombies with traps,
wipe out the crowds of skeletons with the zombie cannon,
and you can even enjoy a harem of beautiful women, it's all up to you.

What kind of game?

  • Build your own crowd world!
    Choose from a collection of zombies, monsters, beautiful women, cannons, various traps, decorative objects, and more!
    Other objects will be added and updated as we go!
  • Share your works and download maps created by others around the world!
  • Crowd AI can be changed! Choose from a selection of different character AIs!
  • I have developed the game alone!
  • This game really offers a unique crowd experience!
